snippet.title: Anomaly President - Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
In this presidential rogue-like action game, gather votes and run for presidency by day, then transform into a warrior to take down your enemies by night! 🌃

Master unique skills to become a swordmaster, a cyber mage, or anything in between, and overthrow the ruthless president! 🗽

🔗 Steam Page: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3156330/Anomaly_President
